statements: SELECT * FROM banned_users;
SELECT user_id, username, ban_reason FROM banned_users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM banned_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, banned_at FROM banned_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, ban_reason FROM banned_users WHERE banned_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM banned_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, ban_reason FROM banned_users WHERE banned_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, banned_at AS ban_timestamp FROM banned_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, ban_reason FROM banned_users WHERE ban_reason LIKE '%inappropriate%';
SELECT user_id, username, banned_at FROM banned_users ORDER BY banned_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM banned_users;
SELECT id, username FROM banned_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM banned_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM banned_ips ORDER BY ban_time DESC;
SELECT ip_address, ban_time FROM banned_ips WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM banned_users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, reason FROM banned_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM banned_ips WHERE user_id = 10 AND ban_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username FROM banned_users JOIN banned_ips ON banned_users.id = banned_ips.user_id WHERE ban_time < NOW();
SELECT id, username, reason FROM banned_users JOIN banned_ips ON banned_users.id = banned_ips.user_id WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM blacklist_users;
SELECT username, email FROM blacklist_users WHERE reason = 'spam';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM blacklist_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM banned_domains WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT domain_name FROM banned_domains WHERE domain_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM blacklist_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM blacklist_users WHERE reason = 'Spam';
SELECT domain_name, description FROM banned_domains ORDER BY domain_name ASC;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM banned_ips WHERE reason LIKE '%malicious%' ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, reason FROM blacklist_users INNER JOIN banned_ips ON blacklist_users.user_id = banned_ips.ip_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE online_behavior = 'active';
SELECT * FROM banned_users WHERE ban_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, reason FROM banned_ips WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%';
SELECT u.username, bi.reason FROM users u JOIN ban_reports br ON u.user_id = br.user_id JOIN banned_ips bi ON br.ip_id = bi.ip_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE online_behavior = 'active';
SELECT user_id, username, email, ban_date FROM users JOIN banned_users ON users.user_id = banned_users.user_id;
SELECT u.username, br.report_date, bi.ip_address FROM users u JOIN ban_reports br ON u.user_id = br.user_id JOIN banned_ips bi ON br.ip_id = bi.ip_id;
SELECT * FROM banned_users WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%' AND ban_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ban_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE banned = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE online_behavior IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, email, banned FROM users WHERE banned = true ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, banned FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, l.ban_date, r.reason_description FROM users u JOIN ban_logs l ON u.user_id = l.user_id JOIN ban_reasons r ON l.reason_id = r.reason_id ORDER BY l.ban_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, b.ban_start_date, b.ban_end_date FROM users u JOIN banned_users b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.ban_end_date IS NULL;
